channel.title: Border on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Border on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-93 South - Welcome To Nevada
item.description: Welcome to Nevada on US-93 south, at the Idaho-Nevada border.

item.title: ID-55 North - Canyon County/Snake River
item.description: ID-55 north crossing the Snake River and entering Canyon County.

item.title: I-19 South - Exit 8
item.description: I-19 south approaching Exit 8 - Grand Ave. I-19 continues south towards the International Border with Mexico. Grand Ave. is the Nogales business loop.

item.title: US-30 West - Entering Caribou County
item.description: Entering Caribou County on US-30 west.

item.title: Welcome To Idaho - US-30 West
item.description: Welcome to Idaho on US-30 west. Entering Bear Lake County. Taken at the Wyoming-Idaho Border.

item.title: Welcome To California - I-40 West
item.description: Welcome to California on I-40 west at the Arizona-California state line crossing the Colorado River. San Bernardino County line.

item.title: I-40 East - Welcome To New Mexico
item.description: Welcome to New Mexico - The Land of Enchantment on I-40 eastbound.

item.title: I-40 East - New Mexico State Line
item.description: New Mexico State Line on I-40 east.

item.title: I-40 East - Entering Navajo Nation
item.description: Entering the Navajo Nation on I-40 east.

item.title: I-40 East - Entering Apache County
item.description: Entering Apache County on I-40 east.

item.title: I-84 East - Entering Umatilla County
item.description: Entering Umatilla County on I-84 east.

item.title: I-84 East - Entering Gilliam County
item.description: Entering Gilliam County on I-84 west, crossing the John Day River.

item.title: Silver Lake Road - Entering Klamath County
item.description: Entering Klamath County on Silver Lake Road west. All Klamath County welcome signs display the text, We Honor Veterans.

item.title: Welcome To California - US-97 South
item.description: Welcome to California on US-97 south. Siskiyou County Line. Taken at the Oregon-California border.

item.title: Welcome To Utah on UT-30 West
item.description: Welcome to Utah on UT-30 west at the Utah-Wyoming Border. This sign is part of a new series of welcome signs for Utah, in which each region has a unique welcome sign.

item.title: End WY-430 South - Leaving Wyoming
item.description: Leaving Wyoming at the southern end of WY-430 South. Taken at the Wyoming-Colorado State Line.

item.title: Welcome To Wyoming
item.description: Welcome To Wyoming on WY-430 North at the Wyoming-Colorado State Line.

item.title: Welcome To Utah - Browns Park
item.description: Welcome to Utah on CH-1364 (Browns Park Road). This welcome sign was posted by the Utah Division of Wildlife Resources. Continue west on Browns Park Road for US-191.

item.title: Welcome To Colorful Colorado
item.description: Welcome to Colorful Colorado on CO-318 East, at the Utah-Colorado State Line.

item.title: Utah State Line on CR-1364
item.description: Utah State Line on CR-1364 (Browns Park Road) at the Wyoming-Utah Border. There is a cattle guard marking the state line.

item.title: Welcome To Utah on UT-43 West
item.description: Welcome to Utah on UT-43 West. The new Utah welcome signs have a different logo for each region of the State. The logo in this region is a Dinosaur. Taken at the Utah-Wyoming State Line.

item.title: I-80 East - Welcome To Wyoming
item.description: Welcome to Wyoming - Forever West, on I-80 east. Taken at the Utah-Wyoming State Line.

item.title: I-80 East - Welcome To Utah
item.description: Welcome to Utah on I-80 east. Each region in Utah has its own type of welcome sign. The welcome sign for the northwestern part of Utah shows a picture of Salt Lake City.

item.title: I-80 East - Utah State Line
item.description: Utah State Line on I-80 east at the Utah-Nevada border. A fancier welcome sign is just east of here. The Utah-Nevada border along I-80 is home to the twin towns of Wendover (Utah) and West Wendover (Nevada). The Nevada side has many large casinos.

item.title: US-93 South - Welcome To Nevada
item.description: Welcome to Nevada on US-93 south, at the Idaho-Nevada border.

item.title: US-20 West - Entering Camas County
item.description: Entering Camas County on US-20 west at the Blaine-Camas County Line.

item.title: I-15 South - Welcome To Idaho
item.description: Welcome to Idaho on I-15 south at the Idaho-Montana stateline on Monida Pass.

item.title: I-15 South - Entering Clark County
item.description: I-15 south Entering Clark Count and Leaving Montana. Taken on Monida Pass on the Continental Divide between Idaho and Montana.

item.title: Welcome To Montana - I-15 North
item.description: Welcome to Montana on I-15 North at the Idaho-Montana state line on Monida Pass. Monida Pass is the Continental Divide.

item.title: I-15 North - Entering Clark County
item.description: Entering Clark County on I-15 north at the Jefferson - Clark County line.

item.title: ID-61 North - Entering Bear Lake County
item.description: Entering Bear Lake County on ID-61 north at the Idaho-Wyoming state line.

item.title: ID-61 North - Welcome To Idaho
item.description: Welcome to Idaho on ID-61 north. The Wyoming milemarker for WY-89 is attached to the sign.

item.title: WY-89 South - Welcome To Wyoming
item.description: Welcome To Wyoming On WY-89 South. This is the new style of welcome sign in Wyoming. Taken on the Wyoming-Idaho border.

item.title: Welcome To Idaho - US-91 North
item.description: Welcome to Idaho on US-91 North.

item.title: US-91 North - Historic Byway Information
item.description: Pioneer Historic Byway information on US-91 north approaching the Idaho State line. Pioneer Historic Byway is within the state of Idaho.

item.title: I-84 East - Welcome To Utah
item.description: Welcome to Utah on I-84 east at the Utah-Idaho state line.

item.title: ID-55 North at Canyon County Line
item.description: ID-55 north crossing the Snake River and entering Canyon County.

item.title: US-95 North - Welcome To Idaho
item.description: Welcome to Idaho on US-95 north at the Oregon-Idaho State Line.

item.title: US-95 North - Oregon Thanks You
item.description: Oregon Thanks You Come Back Soon on US-95 north.

item.title: US-50/BL-80 West - Yolo-Sacramento County Line
item.description: US-50/BL-80 west at the Yolo-Sacramento County Line at the Sacramento River. Also entering the city of West Sacramento.

item.title: US-50 West - Welcome To California
item.description: Welcome to California on US-50 west at the California-Nevada state line. Entering South Lake Tahoe.

item.title: US-50 West - Entering Carson City
item.description: US-50 west at the Lyon County - Carson City line. When entering all other counties in Nevada, the county name is above the words County Line. In Carson City, the County Line is replaced with State Capitol.

item.title: I-10 West - Welcome To California
item.description: Welcome to California on I-10 West/US-95 north, just west of the California State Agricultural Inspection Station. Entering Pacific Time Zone.

item.title: I-10 West - Exit 243
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 243 - Riviera Drive. Taken upon leaving the California State Agricultural Inspection Station.

item.title: I-10 West - California State Line
item.description: California State Line on I-10 west crossing the Colorado River, at the Arizona-California Border.

item.title: US-60 West - Entering La Paz County
item.description: Entering La Paz County on US-60 west at the La Paz - Maricopa County Line.

item.title: US-60 West - Entering Maricopa County
item.description: Entering Maricopa County on US-60 west at the Maricopa-Pinal County Line.

item.title: AZ-78 West - Welcome To Arizona
item.description: Welcome to Arizona on AZ-78 west at the Arizona-New Mexico State Line.

item.title: NM-78 East - Welcome To New Mexico
item.description: Welcome to New Mexico on NM-78 east. Begin DOT Maintenance.

item.title: US-180 West - Catron County Line
item.description: Catron County Line on US-180 west at the Grant-Catron County Line.

item.title: I-10 East - Welcome To New Mexico
item.description: Welcome to New Mexico on I-10 east. Taken at the Arizona-New Mexico State Line.

item.title: I-10 East - Entering Cochise County
item.description: Entering Cochise County on I-10 east at the Pima-Cochise County Line.

item.title: I-8 East - Welcome To Arizona
item.description: I-8 east - Welcome To Arizona. The welcome sign is about a mile inside of Arizona after Exit 1. There is a smaller welcome sign on the Colorado River bridge at the actual state line.

item.title: I-8 East - Arizona State Line
item.description: Arizona State Line, Yuma County Line, and Yuma City Limits on the Colorado River bridge at the Arizona-California State Line.

item.title: I-80 East - Welcome To Nevada
item.description: Welcome To Nevada on I-80 east at the California-Nevada state line. I-80 through Nevada is called the Purple Heart Trail.

item.title: Welcome To Idaho - ID-6 East
item.description: Welcome to Idaho on ID-6 east.

item.title: WA-274 - Welcome To Washington
item.description: Welcome to Washington on WA-274 west.

item.title: Leaving Coeur d'Alene Indian Reservation
item.description: Leaving the Coeur d’Alene Indian Reservation on ID-60 west at the Idaho-Washington State Line.

item.title: End ID-60
item.description: End ID-60 West at Washington State Line

item.title: BL-19 South at I-19 and Border Crossing
item.description: BL-19 south at I-19 north to Tucson. Continue on BL-19 south for the border crossing into Mexico. This is the beginning of I-19.

item.title: I-19 at Crawford St. - Border Crossing Station
item.description: I-19 at Crawford St. Turn left on Crawford St. for the Border Crossing Station. There is a bilingual warning about bringing firearms and ammunition into Mexico.

item.title: I-19 South - Exit 1A
item.description: I-19 south at Exit 1A - International St. I-19 continues towards the International Border with Mexico.

item.title: Border Corssing Status on AZ-189 South
item.description: Border crossing status on AZ-189 south for the truck border crossing. The port is currently open.

item.title: I-19 South - Exit 4 and Exit 1B
item.description: I-19 south at Exit 4 - AZ-189 South/Border Truck Route. Approaching Exit 1B - Western Ave. The international border with Mexico is 6 km to the south via I-19.

item.title: I-19 South - Exit 8
item.description: I-19 south approaching Exit 8 - Grand Ave. I-19 continues south towards the International Border with Mexico. Grand Ave. is the Nogales business loop.

item.title: I-19 South - Weapons Illegal In Mexico
item.description: Bilingual warning about prohibition of weapons and ammunition in Mexico on I-19 south. There is another warning further south on I-19.

item.title: I-84 West - Welcome To Idaho
item.description: Welcome to Idaho on I-84 west at the Utah border.

item.title: End CO-90 at the Utah State Line
item.description: End CO-90 west at the Utah State Line. CO-90 continues as UT-46 into Utah.

item.title: US-89 South - Welcome To Arizona
item.description: Welcome to Arizona on US-89 south at the Utah-Arizona line.

item.title: US-2 West - Welcome To Washington
item.description: Welcome to Washington on US-2 west at ID-41 jct. Use ID-41 south for Spirit Lake and Coeur d’Alene. US-2 west for Newport and Spokane.

item.title: End ID-41 North at US-2
item.description: End ID-41 north at US-2.

item.title: US-2 East at Idaho Border - Signed As ID-41
item.description: ID-41 signage on US-2 approaching the Idaho state line. Approaching ID-41 jct., although this sign does not specify that.

item.title: End ID-41 North at US-2
item.description: End ID-41north at US-2 - west to Newport/City Center; east to Priest River/Sandpoint. ID-41 is the dividing line between Washington and Idaho.

item.title: End ID-41 North at US-2
item.description: End ID-41 north at US-2. ID-41 through Oldtown is on the state line. The east side of the street is in Idaho; the west side in Washington.

item.title: WA-290 West - Welcome To Washington
item.description: Welcome to Washington on WA-290 west. Taken at the Idaho-Washington border.

item.title: Begin ID-53 - Idaho/Washington Border
item.description: Begin ID-53 west at the Washington-Idaho border.

item.title: I-15 North - Welcome To Idaho
item.description: Welcome to Idaho on I-15 North at the Utah/Idaho border.

item.title: End CA-186 South - Mexico Customs
item.description: End CA-186 south at Mexico customs.

item.title: Approaching Northern End of I-15
item.description: End of I-15 at the Canadian Border

item.title: I-15 - Maximum 25
item.description: Canadian Speed Limit Zone Approaching Customs Canada Construction Area on I-15 North.

item.title: I-15 North Approaching US Customs
item.description: US Customs 800 Feet on I-15 North

item.title: I-15 North at Canada Border
item.description: View of US-Canada Border at Northern Terminus of I-15

item.title: I-15 North Exit 397
item.description: Sweetgrass Exit on I-15 North. Last Exit on I-15 North Before Customs Canada

item.title: AZ-389 East - Welcome To Arizona
item.description: Arizona Welcome Sign on AZ-389 East in Colorado City, Arizona. Taken at the Utah-Arizona line.

item.title: I-15 North - Welcome To Arizona
item.description: Welcome to Arizona on I-15 north. This is also the boundary between Pacific and Mountain Time Zone, during standard time. Arizona does not observe Daylight Savings Time, so when DST is active Nevada and Arizona are on the same time.

item.title: US-395 North Approaching Canadian Border - Laurier
item.description: US-395 North approaching the United States - Canada Border. The United States side is Port of Laurier; the Canadian side is Port of Cascade.

item.title: US-395 North Approaching United States - Canada Border
item.description: US-395 North approaching the United States - Canada Border. The United States side is Port of Laurier; the Canadian side is Port of Cascade.
